PC SDK Programming GuideÂ¶

This section is designed to lay out all the necessary components that is required to create a game for Hypereal hardware platform. In order to fully utilize all the Hypreal hardware features, we described in the guide how specific features and functionalities should be implemented with Hypreal PC SDK.
